title: Oh, Sweet John Maynard!
author: VD
content_html:
Either the Google+ profile is fake or Paul Krugman actually concurs with the joke making the rounds:

People on twitter might be joking, but in all seriousness, we would see a bigger boost in spending and hence economic growth if the earthquake had done more damage.

Ladies and gentlemen, give that man another Nobel Prize!

the joke making the rounds
